programme.title: Martian Attractions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Martian Attractions, S04E07, The Latest in Martian exploration from orbit and on the ground, new sources of water and planetary dust storms are a few of the stories unfolding on to the Red Planet.

programme.title: The Astronauts
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Astronauts, S02E01, One hundred kilometres above the Earth’s surface lies an invisible frontier: the edge of space.

programme.title: Cosmic Collisions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Cosmic Collisions, S03E08, Cosmic and x rays, these mysterious and highly powerful particles from deep space are being investigated to finally discover where they come from.

programme.title: GIANTS IN THE DARK
programme.desc: The New Frontier: GIANTS IN THE DARK, S05E06, Asteroids, the debris from the early solar system hold tantalizing clues to planetary formation. The spacecraft Psyche readies to study a unique metallic asteroid.

programme.title: Living Planet
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living Planet, S03E07, With continuous observation of arth from orbit scientists have built a data set over time that reveals much about how the Earth breaths and life sustains itself on this living Planet.

programme.title: Where Are All the Aliens?
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Where Are All the Aliens?, S04E10, We’re looking hard, but the numbers aren’t stacking up, is life on other planets that hard to find? Even signals from an advanced race elude us.

programme.title: Next Stop Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Next Stop Mars, S01E04, It has fired our imaginations for millennia, Mars, the God of War and the source of Man's science fictional demise.

programme.title: Planet X
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Planet X, S04E04, The New Horizons mission continues deeper into space, it’s next target looming close.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Stargazer's Paradise
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Stargazer's Paradise, S02E04, The Atacama desert is a perfect place for watching the night sky. With still winds and only a handful of cloudy nights each year, it allows scientists to get the absolute most out of their tools.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Hitchhike To Murder / In The Care Of A Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E15, Police must wait nearly 30 years before advances in DNA technology give them the chance to convict the killer of a young hitchhiker, and Philadelphia police wage a 16-year hunt for the man who raped and killed a 10-year-old girl.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E07, A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Taken in Tacoma
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E06, When 13-year-old Jennifer Bastian is abducted and murdered in August of 1986, residents of Tacoma panic. This is the second young girl killed in five months. Convinced a predator is loose, Police embark on a 32-year inquiry.

programme.title: A Killer's Skin / Where's Peggy? (#110)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E28, Police in Albany, N.Y., get a surprise when a killer they think targets only older women is suspected in the murder of an elderly man. And the contents of a secret storage shed holds the grisly clues to a murder that has gone cold for more than 14 years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2011, A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Sisters In Death
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E17, March 1984. Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. 30 years later, an informant gives up a name.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E09, When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5015, Our cameras follow Detective Manny Reyes as he investigates the 1990 murder of a Fort Worth, Texas woman. Reyes talks to the woman's two sons, who believe that her husband, Bobby, was the murderer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Little Girl Lost
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E01, Halloween in a small town is canceled indefinitely when a young girl is kidnapped and killed on her way home from a costume party.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E14, A serial rapist seals his own fate when he sends a taunting letter to police. And when a man is found dead in South Dakota, his head bashed in by a 50-pound rock, investigators go on a 20-year search for the killers.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's mischievous cousin Abigail is back in Middleton.

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E01, Hallmark Original Series. Abby returns to Maryland when she receives a phone call from her sister.

programme.title: Home to Roost, Part One
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. The O'Brien family reunites in Chesapeake Shores for the first time in years.

programme.title: Home to Roost, Part Two
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. The O'Brien family reunion weekend continues.

programme.title: Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E21, Daniel finds a crystal skull identical to one first discovered by his grandfather. When Daniel stares into the skull's eyes, a force makes him disappear. Now SG-1 must find his grandfather to unlock the mystery of the skull and bring Daniel home.

programme.title: Nemesis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E22, O'Neill is kidnapped by the Asgard and encounters a swarm of vicious metallic bug-like creatures on a mission to destroy Earth. O'Neill plans to blow up the ship and sacrifice himself, but can the team find another way to stop this apocalyptic plan?

programme.title: Small Victories
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E01, SG-1 is called upon to help a race of gentle, highly-intelligent aliens struggling against a swarm of deadly mechanical spiders called Replicators. But the situation becomes much more complicated when a lone Replicator is discovered back on Earth.

programme.title: The Other Side
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E02, SG-1 responds to a cry for help from a doomed civilization, which promises to give Earthlings access to advanced technology in exchange for supplies that would help them defeat their enemies. But they soon discover that SG-1 may not be helping.

programme.title: Upgrades
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E03, SG-1 is selected to test the effects of alien-tech wristbands on human wearers, and soon find themselves blessed with spectacular strength and speed. But when they are sent on a mission utilizing these new abilities, they learn a shocking lesson.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E04, When a High Priestess from the planet Chulak claims to have a plan that would cripple the Goa'uld, everyone is skeptical. SG-1 must join forces with the Tok'ra in order to put her plan into effect, but a deadly, hidden secret could jeopardize it.

programme.title: Divide And Conquer
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E05, When an SGC soldier under the influence of a Goa'uld mind-control device attempts to assassinate a High Council member, SG-1 must uncover other potential assassins, even amongst themselves, before the president arrives for a crucial Summit meeting!

programme.title: Window Of Opportunity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E06, After a visit to a strange planet in the middle of a geomagnetic storm they find themselves repeating the same day over and over again. The team must utilize their accumulated knowledge to stop the time loop before there are disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Watergate
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E07, SG-1 joins forces with a Russian scientist to investigate a rogue Stargate in Siberia, linked to a mysterious water planet. The team must venture via submarine to the water planet, where they encounter an unexpectedly terrifying alien presence.

programme.title: The First Ones
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E08, During an archaeological survey of fossils on a Goa'uld planet, Daniel is abducted by a fearsome creature, prompting SG-1 to embark on a mission to free him. But Daniel soon learns that the creature's intentions are not what he thought!

programme.title: Scorched Earth
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E09, After relocating an endangered civilization to a safe new planet, the team realizes that another race of aliens is planning to incinerate the planet's surface to make it inhabitable. Will SG-1 be able to reason with the marauding aliens?

programme.title: Beneath The Surface
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E10, With memories erased and identities changed, SG-1 find themselves trapped below a domed city on a planet of ice, toiling as slave laborers. Can they come to their senses and make a break for the surface, or will they remain enslaved underground?

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E18, Teyla, more determined than ever to find the missing Athosians, convinces Sheppard to travel with her to a trading settlement in search for answers. What they find there leads them to startling discovery that no one could have anticipated.

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E19, After an unforeseen return, Dr. Carson Beckett shares that he has been held captive. As Teyla is re-united with some missing fellow Athosians, she begins to formulate a plan to ensure their escape, if she is able to find them in time.

programme.title: The Last Man
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E20, Disheartened by another unsuccessful search for Teyla, Lt. Colonel Sheppard returns to Atlantis and senses that something is not right—the city has been abandoned. Now, McKay sets out on a risky plan to reverse a future that went horribly wrong.

programme.title: Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E01, As Sheppard and Ronon are trapped beneath a collapsed compound, McKay and Lorne are trapped in another pocket of debris. Michael’s flagship Wraith Cruiser hurtles towards the compound, while Carter leads a rescue mission. Who will reach them first?

programme.title: The Seed
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E02, When Dr. Keller fails to report for her shift, concerned team members are shocked to discover her unconscious in her quarters. With the situation on Atlantis escalating, Woolsey is ultimately faced with a decision that could cost Keller her life.

programme.title: Smashed
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E25, Rush dumps Ryan and Austin off on Steve on the same day that he is hosting a fraternity party. Kelly invites Tara to stay with her after she finishes her stint in rehab.

programme.title: Flirting With Disaster
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E26, Brandon, Steve, and Joe go on a camping trip with Susan, Clare, and Donna. The girls become jealous when the guys repeatedly ignore them to help some damsels in distress. Tara sabotages Kelly's relationship with Greg.

programme.title: Ticket To Ride
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E29, Colin tries to remain strong as he prepares to turn himself in and begin his prison term. Brandon and Susan lose a five-thousand-dollar lottery ticket, leading to a major argument.

programme.title: Ray Of Hope
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E30, Kelly agrees to help with the search for Colin when Brandon reveals that Nat could fall victim to the bail bondsman through his business ties to Valerie. Donna balks when she and David are asked to produce a music video for Ray.

programme.title: Remember The Alamo
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E01, Brandon and Steve run into a bit of trouble when their car breaks down. Donna works with David on a video shoot, and the singer isn't the only one that is hard to deal with.

programme.title: A Mate For Life
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E03, Joan's daughter Lily comes to town to serve as maid of honor, and seduces best man Brandon. David tries to get another video contract after being dropped by MZA. Valerie sees Kenny having lunch with his family.

programme.title: Disappearing Act
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E04, Kelly helps Jimmy treat a bleeding cut, and panics after getting some blood on her hand. David refuses to tell his father that he has dropped out of school. Brandon and Mark hire a confident young woman as their news anchor.

programme.title: Housewarming
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E06, David and Mark throw a big party at their house. Clare catches Steve kissing another girl. Valerie comes clean with Brandon about her affair with Kenny.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E07, Kenny orders Valerie to terminate her pregnancy. Steve is miffed when Clare chooses to go to the Halloween concert with egotistical Dick Harrison. Brandon and Tracy spend time together at the club.

programme.title: The Things We Do For Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E08, Steve overhears Val discussing her pregnancy on the phone. David's grandfather leaves him $250,000 and a 1961 Thunderbird. An uncomfortable Tracy decides to quit her TV job after Brandon nixes a relationship.

programme.title: Loser Take All
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E09, Brandon goes to see Kenny, who portrays himself as an innocent victim caught on the web of an evil vixen. Mel, worried by David's newfound wealth, asks Donna to keep an eye on him. Steve impresses Clare with his dedication as he trains for the crew race.

programme.title: If I Had A Hammer
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E11, During must see a psychiatrist after displaying hostile behavior. Mel agrees with the doctor's recommendation that David be held 72 hours for observation. Steve faces plagiarism charges. The gang helps Willie build a house.

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E12, Steve elects to plead guilty, leaving his punishment to the lenient Chancellor Arnold. Brandon refuses to plead guilty to a crime he did not commit, and faces a hearing and possible expulsion. Felice objects to Donna's renewed relationship with David.

programme.title: Unnecessary Roughness
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E15, Donna believes she has solved the mystery of her stalker's identity when she sees Garrett Slan, the man who tried to rape her, at the university.

programme.title: Face-Off
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E16, Donna's request for a permanent restraining order against Slan is denied. Tracy accidentally tells Brandon that she loves him. Steve and Clare consider living together as they spend a weekend house sitting. David takes an interest in a young singer.

programme.title: We Interrupt This Program
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E17, Donna's stalker confesses and holds the entire staff of the TV station hostage.

programme.title: With This Ring
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E19, Brandon and Kelly each confess their feelings to friends, but expect the other person to make a move. Donna tries to reconcile with David. Steve and Clare double date with Ryan and his girlfriend.

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E211, Two 10-year-olds take a short cut home across a drainage ditch, which suddenly fills with water. A family suffers from carbon monoxide poisoning.

programme.title: Water Dance
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E18, Cody learns a lesson in love when he and Mitch help a troubled violinist escape her dangerously overbearing mentor with a secret agenda. Meanwhile, Alex sets out to prove her worth at Baywatch by retaking the grueling rookie test with Jessie.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E19, Alex tries to save a diamond smuggler whose partners want him to "sleep with the fishes." Neely makes Hobie a tempting offer that divides the Buchannon household.

programme.title: Wave Rage
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E20, After Manny suffers a life-altering injury during a rescue, April tries to save him from himself. Neely meets her match in Alex when she tries to discredit Mitch.

programme.title: Galaxy Girls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E21, April and Jessie search for the perfect celebrity host for a seaside beauty contest. Mitch and Alex help Manny adjust to his paralysis.

programme.title: Castles in the Sand
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E22, Alex's search for the creator of several elaborate sandcastles is interrupted when she gets stuck entertaining her best friend's fiancée, who falls madly for Mitch. Cody loses his cool when his new boat is stolen while he's scuba diving with Newmie.

programme.title: Aloha Baywatch
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E01, Mitch envisions an International "Top Gun" style lifeguard school in Hawaii. He invites Sean Monroe to lead the new team, which will include a variety of highly-rated lifeguards from beaches around the world.

programme.title: Mahalo Hawaii
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E02, Amidst the chaos, the new Baywatch Hawaii team must learn to work and live together. Jason meets a man with a mysterious past. A girl Mitch saved suffers from secondary drowning, leading to a critical test of the new recruits.

programme.title: Weak Link
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E03, Tanner visits Mitch, tours the Islands, and befriends a dying girl. After failing her initial "test", Dawn challenges Sean to a dangerous contest with her future at Baywatch hanging in the balance. JD competes to join the America's Cup Sailing Team.

programme.title: Shark Island
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E04, Tanner believes The Shark Island Legend. Mitch doesn't. Team Baywatch competes with the Coast Guard. Jessie and Kekoa both dump JD. Swimming naked in a Hawaiian purification ritual, Jesse has to make a rescue in the nude.

programme.title: Strike Team
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E05, Sean leads Team Baywatch on a daring night rescue in shark-infested waters to save 6 kayaking teens stranded off the perilous Na Pali coast.

programme.title: Sunday in Kauai
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E06, Jessie and Kekoa battle each other even as they rescue a man stranded behind a waterfall! Sean and Allie search for treasure. JD and Jason help two girls save a cat caught on a boat mast, but wind up catapulting it across the water!

programme.title: Risk to Death
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E07, Sean threatens to kick Jason off the team after Jason defies his orders and makes a daring rescue. Allie, Dawn, and Nick have to save a drowning man and his pregnant wife about to give birth in the ocean.

programme.title: Father of the Groom
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E08, Sean is faced with a life-or-death decision during a daring cave rescue in which Kekoa faces her greatest fear. Hobie plans to get married, but Mitch is at odds with his fiancée’s obnoxious parents.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E09, The Team hunts men mutilating sharks for their fins. Jason, who's always feared sharks, learns to accept the local tradition that sharks are sacred protectors of the Hawaiian Islands.

programme.title: Gold from the Deep
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E10, Allie discovers a rare Hawaiian coin from a ship that sank after the Pearl Harbor attack. Sean lets the team dive for sunken treasure provided it doubles as a training exercise. The deep-sea dive leads to discord, dissent, and explosive danger.

programme.title: Bent
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E11, Allie is terrified she may lose the love of her life when Nick gets the bends in a daring attempt to rescue a mini-sub on the ocean floor.

programme.title: Path of Least Resistance
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E12, A dark secret from Dawn's past could jeopardize her career as a Baywatch Hawaii Lifeguard. JD puts his new invention, a double scuba fin, to the test trying to rescue a young boy being sucked into whirring propeller blades in a storm vent.
